name: Stephen's World
description:
Stephen's World is a 3D, first-person narrative exploration game about social issues like loneliness, you play as Stephen,  an elderly man, who lives in an abandoned village, reminiscing about the times when everything was lively. Your goal is to explore the village and learn more about Stephen's past. 

The game was coded and designed by me. The game is highly optimized and should run on most computers.
